reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Pacchetto pilota di iniziative per la visibilità e la comunicazione dell'AICS

description.narrative: L'iniziativa mira a rafforzare la visibilità di interventi dell'Agenzia Italiana per la Cooperazione allo Sviluppo in Libano e per aumentare la consapevolezza circa le attività di cooperazione italiana nel Paese.

The initiative aims at enhancing the interventions visibility of the Italian Agency for Development Cooperation - AICS in Lebanon and to increase the awareness about the Italian Cooperation activities in the country. In addition to increasing the knowledge of youth generations in Lebanon about the central sectors of intervention of the Italian Cooperation, such as sustainable development, human rights, etc.

tag.narrative: Fully operationalize the technology bank and science, technology and innovation capacity-building mechanism for least developed countries by 2017 and enhance the use of enabling technology, in particular information and communications technology
